org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui

Class MouseScrollPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbsolutePanel
      • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.MouseScrollPanel

  • public class MouseScrollPanel
extends AbsolutePanel
    Scroll panel handling mouse events to enable panning by dragging the mouse.

    The first widget that is added to the panel is used for the scrolling.
    Author:
    clc
